data.title: Cartoon All-Stars to the Rescue (2024 film)/Credits
authors: Contributors to The JH Movie Collection's Official Wiki
data.meta_description: Here are the credits for the 2024 live-action/animated prevention action history musical fantasy film based on the original 1990 television special, Cartoon All-Stars to the Rescue. Walt Disney Pictures Universal Pictures and Warner Bros. Pictures presents A Fairview/Sergio Pablos and Mattel...
data.meta_site_name: The JH Movie Collection's Official Wiki
